welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Justo, Argentina! Embrace the charm of this vibrant city, known for its rich cultural heritage and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that San Justo has to offer.

restaurants.name: La Tradicion
restaurants.description: La Tradicion is a deli located in San Justo.
restaurants.address: Ruta Nacional 11 km (Mantovani), San Justo, Santa Fe

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used for domestic flights within Argentina.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used for international flights, with a focus on flights to and from North America.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used for international flights, with a focus on flights to and from Europe.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used for international flights, with a focus on flights to and from other South American countries.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport, with a limit of 3 hours per device.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
